Articles.Content: Whenever I used to rotate something, it would snap to the nearest tick mark and I could get exact angles. Now, it is stuck so that when I rotate a part, it has infinite rotation snap.(I'm bad at explaining) Any Help?
Press 'c' to toggle angle snap on and off. With it on hold 'shift' to get finer snap increments.

It sounds like you turned off the snap function.  Next to the symmetry indicator in the VAB GUI, there should be a second indicator that shows a circle within either hexagon or a circle, this is the snap indicator.  If it is a circle that means snap is off, and you can turn it back on by clicking on the indicator and turning it into a hexagon.
